game.name: Epoch Cycle
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Apocalypse is Not the End, It's Your Beginning. Become the supreme leader of a civilization in an apocalyptic world. Every collapse fuels the rise of a new era—your choices will forge a legacy across four monumental epochs.
